item.title: Sneak preview sivis - Turning browser clicks intro reproducible scraping code
item.description:
Sivis enables you to select data in the browser by clicking on it and then generates r code for you to scrape this data periodically. For a preview see the following video.
I am working on this package for over a year now. Maybe its too early to leave the pre-alpha state, but it guess there is a certain time to put it out there: Github repo. How does sivis work?

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Tonio. I enjoy programming in R, especially working on the interface of webservers and R(Studio). Besides programming I love playing squash and road racing with my bike. I dream of bringing my paragliding licence to good use one day and spend my after works in the air. I graduated with a M.Sc. in quant. finance. Prior to working as a data scientist in Frankfurt I gained experience as a data analytics consultant and founded an analytics startup.
